item.title: 卢拉敦促巴西国家石油公司砍掉 "抢劫 "消费者的燃料中间商
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周一表示，巴西国营石油生产商巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）应摆脱中间商，直接向消费者销售，以降低燃料价格。【原文：Brazil’s state-run oil producer Petrobras should get rid of intermediaries and sell directly to consumers in order to lower fuel prices, President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said Monday.】

item.title: 英国国家财富基金总裁约翰-弗林特计划下台
item.description: 英国国家财富基金领导人约翰-弗林特（John Flint）将于今年夏天卸任，这是他被任命领导这个新成立的组织数月之后的事。【原文：John Flint, the leader of the UK’s National Wealth Fund, will step down this summer, months after he was named to lead the newly formed organization.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚与私人股本公司合作开展价值 6 亿美元的乳制品项目
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚主权财富基金与英国私募股权公司 Asset Green 签署了一份股东协议，在这个非洲之角的国家投资 6 亿美元建设奶牛养殖和加工项目。【原文：Ethiopia’s sovereign wealth fund has signed a shareholder agreement with UK private equity firm Asset Green for a $600 million dairy farming and processing project in the Horn of Africa nation.】

item.title: 能源行业发展滞后，2024 年哥伦比亚经济低速增长
item.description: 由于石油、天然气和煤炭行业萎缩，同时紧缩的货币政策阻碍了制造业的发展，哥伦比亚又经历了经济增长乏力的一年。【原文：Colombia suffered another year of weak economic growth as the oil, gas and coal sectors contracted while tight monetary policy held back manufacturing.】

item.title: 威廉姆森计划提前离职，老互惠开始物色首席执行官
item.description: Old Mutual Ltd. 正着手物色新的首席执行官，以接替执掌公司五年后将于 8 月底卸任的 Iain Williamson。【原文：Old Mutual Ltd. is embarking on a search for a new chief executive officer to replace Iain Williamson who will step down at the end of August after five years at the helm.】

item.title: 新西兰央行将第三次降息半点以振兴经济
item.description: 新西兰央行将连续第三次大幅降息，并发出今年进一步降息以重振经济增长的信号。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank is set to deliver its third big interest-rate cut in a row and signal further reductions this year to rekindle economic growth.】

item.title: 津巴布韦最大零售商呼吁 ZiG 自由浮动
item.description: 南部非洲国家最大的连锁超市 OK 津巴布韦有限公司呼吁当局放开汇率，以帮助重振陷入困境的正规零售业。【原文：OK Zimbabwe Ltd., the southern African nation’s biggest supermarket chain, called on the authorities to free-float the exchange rate to help revive the embattled formal retail sector.】

item.title: 韦丹塔债权人周二开会就印度分拆计划进行表决
item.description: 韦丹塔公司（Vedanta Ltd.）的债权人将于周二举行会议，对将这家印度矿业企业集团拆分为至少五家不同企业的计划做出最终裁决，这是该集团长达数月之久的努力中的关键一步，旨在简化集团结构，帮助管理其债务负担。【原文：Vedanta Ltd.’s creditors will meet Tuesday to give their final verdict on a plan to split the Indian mining conglomerate into at least five different businesses, a key step in a months-long effort to simplify the group’s structure and help manage its debt burden.】

item.title: 西方联盟的分歧令乌克兰债券涨势存疑
item.description: 随着北约盟国开始就乌克兰的未来发生冲突，新兴市场投资者开始质疑乌克兰债券还有多少上涨空间。【原文：Emerging-market investors are beginning to question how much more upside exists in Ukraine’s bonds as NATO allies begin to clash over the nation’s future.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼看到银行监管不作为的 "令人担忧的趋势
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）呼吁减少银行监管的不透明性，称监督和监管方法需要更新，以便更好地服务于金融体系。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman called for less opacity in bank oversight, saying the supervisory and regulatory approach needs updating so it better serves the financial system.】

item.title: 巴西顶级制糖企业 Raizen 将出售资产、削减投资
item.description: 巴西借贷成本飙升后，巴西最大的糖和乙醇生产商 Raizen SA 正在研究潜在的资产出售，并停止建设新工厂的项目，以努力减少债务。【原文：Brazil’s largest sugar and ethanol maker Raizen SA is looking at potential asset sales and halting projects to build new plants in an effort to reduce debt after borrowing costs soared in the country.】

item.title: 战争挤压投资和出口，2024 年以色列经济增长放缓
item.description: 去年，以色列的经济增长速度是二十多年来最慢的，这还不包括 "Covid-19 "大流行病的影响。【原文：Israel’s economy grew at its slowest pace in over two decades last year, excluding the Covid-19 pandemic, underlining the toll of wars fought in Gaza and Lebanon throughout much of the year.】

item.title: 美联储哈克支持维持利率不变，称政策仍具限制性
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行行长帕特里克-哈克（Patrick Harker）表示，在官员们等待通胀取得更多进展之际，货币政策已做好准备。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia President Patrick Harker said monetary policy is well positioned as officials wait for more progress on inflation.】

item.title: General Atlantic 收购总部位于迪拜的 Huda Beauty 香水部门
item.description: General Atlantic 同意收购化妆品公司 Huda Beauty 旗下快速增长的香水部门的股份，这是迪拜企业吸引国际投资者兴趣的最新例证。【原文：General Atlantic agreed to buy a stake in the fast-growing perfume division of cosmetics company Huda Beauty, the latest example of a business based in Dubai drawing interest from international investors.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯飙升 20%，国防股反弹提升次级 IPO 的吸引力
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）的股价创下四年半以来的最大涨幅，原因是这家德国钢铁制造商计划在欧洲努力增加军费开支之际，对其潜艇制造部门进行首次公开募股。【原文：Shares of Thyssenkrupp AG jumped the most in four and a half years as investors focused on the German steelmaker’s plans to conduct an initial public offering of its submarine-making unit at a time when Europe is trying to boost military spending.】

item.title: 埃及与塞浦路斯签署克罗诺斯和阿佛洛狄特天然气出口协议
item.description: 埃及和塞浦路斯周一签署了塞浦路斯天然气再出口和商业化协议，这些协议对于开罗推动成为地区能源出口国至关重要，因为在过去几年中，开罗自身的天然气产量出现了下降。【原文：Egypt and Cyprus on Monday signed deals for the reexport and commercialization of Cypriot gas, agreements that are key for Cairo in its push to become a regional energy exporter as its own output suffered declines in the past couple of years.】

item.title: 印度食糖产量趋紧，糖价回升
item.description: 由于世界第二大产糖国印度的产量令人失望，威胁到及时供应的价格上涨，预计糖市将趋于紧张。【原文：The sugar market is expected to tighten as disappointing output in India, the world’s second-largest producer, threatens higher prices for prompt supplies.】

item.title: 特朗普如何重塑印度与美国的贸易和防务关系
item.description: 多年来，美国和印度的关系日益密切。华盛顿认为印度是对抗更加自信的中国的重要地区力量，而对新德里来说，美国已成为日益重要的外国投资来源以及贸易和安全合作伙伴。【原文：The US and India have been edging closer together for years. Washington sees India as a key regional counterweight against a more assertive China, while for New Delhi, the US has become an increasingly important source of foreign investment and a partner for trade and security.】

item.title: 巴斯夫与 Sherwin-Williams 签订价值 11.5 亿美元的巴西交易
item.description: 巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）将以 11.5 亿美元的价格将其巴西涂料部门出售给 Sherwin-Williams 公司，这是该德国公司专注于其主要化学品、工业和营养部门的广泛战略的一部分。【原文：BASF SE will sell its Brazilian paints unit to Sherwin-Williams Company for $1.15 billion, as part of the German company’s wider strategy to focus on its main chemicals, industrial and nutrition divisions.】

item.title: 电价为何会出现负值及其意义
item.description: 从挪威的山顶风力涡轮机到澳大利亚的屋顶太阳能电池板，可再生能源正前所未有地涌入电网。由于这些新能源的输出会随着风向和太阳的移动而波动，因此它们输出的电力往往超过电网的吸收能力，从而导致了 "负 "电价的奇怪现象。【原文：From mountain-top wind turbines in Norway to rooftop solar panels in Australia, renewable energy is flooding into power networks like never before. Because the output from these new sources fluctuates with the changing winds and the movement of the sun, they often deliver more electricity than grids can absorb, leading to the curious phenomenon of “negative” power prices.】

item.title: 匈牙利新行长普莱辛格认为利率政策将保持稳定
item.description: 即将离任的政策制定者居拉-普莱辛格（Gyula Pleschinger）表示，匈牙利央行今年没有下调关键政策利率的余地，而加息也是 "不可想象的"。【原文：Hungary’s central bank has no room to cut the key policy rate this year, while a hike is also “unthinkable,” according to outgoing policymaker Gyula Pleschinger.】

item.title: 迪拜开发商从全球购房者中获得丰厚利润
item.description: 迪拜房地产开发商的狂欢仍在继续。【原文：The party is still raging on for Dubai’s property developers.】

item.title: 重油短缺正成为欧佩克的福音
item.description:
取代俄罗斯供应的争夺战正在引发中东原油溢价大涨。【原文：

The scrum to replace Russian supply is sparking bumper premiums for Middle Eastern crude.

】

item.title: Petra Diamonds 首席执行官辞职后股价暴跌，盈利下降 60
item.description: Petra Diamonds Ltd.股价暴跌，此前这家在英国上市的矿业公司宣布首席执行官离职，盈利大幅下降，并违反了贷款契约。【原文：Petra Diamonds Ltd. shares slumped after the UK-listed miner announced the exit of its chief executive officer along with a sharp drop in earnings and a breach of its lending covenants.】

item.title: 2024 年爱尔兰医疗和制药产品出口创历史新高
item.description: 新数据显示，爱尔兰出口在2024年创下历史新高，这主要得益于医疗和医药产品出口的增长。【原文：Irish exports hit a record level in 2024, according to new data, largely driven by a boost in medical and pharmaceutical products being sent abroad.】

item.title: 纳格尔称美国新关税将对德国造成特别严重的打击
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，美国的保护主义和贸易关税对德国的打击尤为严重，这使得欧洲最大经济体本已黯淡的前景更加雪上加霜。【原文：Germany would be particularly hard hit by US protectionism and trade tariffs, Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said, worsening an already gloomy outlook for Europe’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 特朗普带领美国走上互惠贸易的迷茫之路
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普上周下令内阁着手制定 "对等 "关税，提出了一个听起来很简单的概念：美国对进口商品征收的税应该反映其他经济体对美国商品征收的关税。【原文：With his move to order his cabinet to start work on “reciprocal” tariffs, Donald Trump last week laid out what sounds like a simple concept: US taxes on imports should reflect those other economies charge US goods as they cross their borders.】

item.title: 发布信息：气候变化助长了社交媒体的使用
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，德雷克-贝内特（Drake Bennett）将介绍气候变化对我们行为的一种不同寻常的影响。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Drake Bennett writes about an unusual way climate change affects our behavior.】

item.title: 肖尔茨未能振兴德国经济令选民不安
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们关注德国经济。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. item.title: 国际货币基金组织称南非需要减少债务以加快增长
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，南非必须采取大胆措施，减轻令人窒息的债务负担，促进经济增长。【原文：South Africa must take bold steps to ease a suffocating debt burden and boost economic growth, said the International Monetary Fund.】
